Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/Wood
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Archer, Wood, 35th Street, then continue their normal route on Archer due to street blockage near Archer/Wood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
